flawed_nl_solution:
The pages she has left to read by Thursday are P + 2P = 3P = 158 - 23 - 38 - 61 = 36 pages.
Therefore, to finish the book on Friday, Cora has to read P = 36 / 3 = <<36/3=21>>21 pages on Thursday.
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
